definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]

sentences.english: His mother didn't have enough money to pay for his education.
sentences.chinese: 他媽媽沒足夠地錢來付出他地膏火。
